scripts.ensure-nsis: node -e "if (process.platform === 'win32') { const c = require('child_process'); const r = c.spawnSync('powershell', ['-ExecutionPolicy','Bypass','-NoProfile','-File','scripts/ensure-nsis-windows.ps1'], { stdio: 'inherit' }); process.exit(r.status !== null ? r.status : 1); }"
scripts.build: npm run ensure-nsis && vite build && tauri build
